title: Consequences of Faster Alignment of Sequences
venue: International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming

tldr.text: Strong conditional lower bounds are given for the more general Multiple Local Alignment problem on k strings, under both k-wise and SP scoring, and for other string similarity problems such as Global Alignment with gap penalties and normalized Longest Common Subsequence.
